A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson completely ruined a film franchise. and whats worse is that this movie has set up a divide amongst fans. Avid supporters of this film blame their own kind for defending their right to love a franchise and refuse to acknowledge the blatant plot holes and fan disservice. No amount of defense can hide the smear this film has had on the Saga as a whole and completely ruined this sequel trilogy and its characters potential. Awful\, would rather watch Attack of the Clones on repeat.
